title: I cannot connect to the League Servers or Riot support page
body:
I have this issue where I can't login because it says "We`re unable to log you in because you may be offline." I have never encountered this before  today and have tried to restart my client and looked up issues similar and had no effect what with fixing my problem. I have even contacted riot support when I go to look at my ticket it says there is an issue saying this "This site canâ€™t be reached
The webpage at https://auth.riotgames.com/authorize?redirect_uri=https://login.support.riotgames.com/login_callback&client_id=player-support-zendesk&ui_locales=en-us%20en-us&response_type=code&scope=openid%20email might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address.
ERR_NAME_RESOLUTION_FAILED" 
I'm at  lost for what I am supposed to do here please someone at Riot games help me out.

replies.body: The problem Has been Fixed I don't know what the cause was but I am thankful it is over.
Hmmmmm sounds like there might have been a little mixup in the servers about 10-12 hours ago. Glad everything seems to be working normally for you all now!!
working now apparently. going to test other services i was having trouble with. gl in the ranked grind
Do any of you have charter as your isp?
I have Charter as well and I do believe it was something to do with that.

Had nothing to do with Spectrum in the slightest, and League just came back.  I have Spectrum, and was online with everything, and clearly they were as well if they were posting, so it was an issue on Riots end that they fixed.
We are all online but all over reddit people have been posting this same thing and people are having trouble with other services and specific websites and all of them have charter.

I too am having this same problem at least with the client. I have googled it and tried every solution that i can find including the solutions to this exact same problem back in june or july of this year and i still cant connect. Was working fine all day too. Then my friend invited me to a game after we just finished one and it said patcher disconnected where the join or decline button is in the notification. So i restarted client and now i get the same thing. "We are unable to log you in because you may be offline".

I had just played on my pbe account then I was going back to my other account to play and now I cant connect to either one. I'm going to assume it's happening to players on the east coast because I see some streamers playing right now so I see that the server is not down.
I too am on east coast.
Yeah trying to submit a ticket isnt working for me either. Site wont load
